channel.title: Kill blade v1
channel.description:
[size=40pt]THIS IS MY FIRST MODEL! DO NOT FLAME ME![/size]
Okay as you can see this is my first model. I think it sucks but please leave me your opinions and what I should make next. I just started models a few days ago. It sounded interesting.
Okay so I'm not going to release this [b][u]UNLESS[/u][/b] I get good feedback.
Time for PICS!!! (Sorry for the small pics thats how I took them)
[URL=http://img522.imageshack.us/my.php?image=longsword1ji9.png][IMG]http://img522.imageshack.us/img522/6305/longsword1ji9.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img237.imageshack.us/my.php?image=longsword2ir0.png][IMG]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/2885/longsword2ir0.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img237.imageshack.us/my.php?image=longsword3ow0.png][IMG]http://img237.imageshack.us/img237/8602/longsword3ow0.th.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img201.imageshack.us/my.php?image=longsword4un2.png][IMG]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/9017/longsword4un2.th.png[/img][/URL]
Well, I think thats it.
DON'T FLAME ME! ITS MY FIRST ONE!
(Yes this is a dragon longsword.) I know I suck so you don't need to tell me that.
I'm currently making a new whip/flail combination.

item.title: Kill blade v1
item.dc:creator: @pluh1 pluh1
item.description:
@pluh1 wrote:

Yeah, it does look cool, but maybe make it look less like a dragon longsword. Make it more like a ninja-to. Make the blade straighter, like this.
___________________________
/
/_____________________________

Lol that’s horrible but u know what I mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Kill blade v1
item.dc:creator: @AncientXD AncientXD
item.description:
@AncientXD wrote:

quite good for a first model

Read full topic

item.title: Kill blade v1
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

da man1:

[quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=325667.msg2553620#msg2553620 date=1227755653]no. u shouldnt model for “easy starts”. thats a BAD excuse. try n push it to your limit each time. you’ll progress faster. become better. and learn more. NO EDITING PRE-MADE MODELS… -.- Just start from a cube and make a wep. thats how me, CJ, Galkon, and other ppl make 100% custom items

Dude, it’s not an excuse…Everybody has first models. And I said ‘Don’t flame me’ so get off this topic.[/quote]

it wasnt flame. it was constructive criticism. and saying “Dont flame” isnt an anti-flame shield. ppl will flame u for saying “Dont Flame”

if you take my 1st comment as flame, ur overly sensitive to comments. ur right everyone does 1st models but its not your ‘first model’ when u add a few faces. id say thats a breach of a copyright: Passing off a jagex model as your own.

I’ll give u credit on this: Gratz for atleast adding new faces and not using a godsword for recolor.

Read full topic

item.title: Kill blade v1
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Its got potential, touch it up a little with some symbols and what not

Read full topic

item.title: Kill blade v1
item.dc:creator: @da_man1 da man1
item.description:
@da_man1 wrote:

dylan_0789:

no. u shouldnt model for “easy starts”. thats a BAD excuse. try n push it to your limit each time. you’ll progress faster. become better. and learn more. NO EDITING PRE-MADE MODELS… -.- Just start from a cube and make a wep. thats how me, CJ, Galkon, and other ppl make 100% custom items

Dude, it’s not an excuse…Everybody has first models. And I said ‘Don’t flame me’ so get off this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Kill blade v1
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

no. u shouldnt model for “easy starts”. thats a BAD excuse. try n push it to your limit each time. you’ll progress faster. become better. and learn more. NO EDITING PRE-MADE MODELS… -.-
Just start from a cube and make a wep. thats how me, CJ, Galkon, and other ppl make 100% custom items

Read full topic
